formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Background-Check Materials for Michael Thompson

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. VerifyRight has received NexTech Solutions’ request to begin the background-check process for your candidate, Michael Thompson. To get started, could you please send the following items to backgrounds@verifyright.com at your earliest convenience?

• Completed & signed background-check authorization/consent form  
• Michael’s full legal name, current address, date of birth, and last four digits of his SSN  
• A copy of his most recent résumé (for employment/education verification)  
• Any internal employment application or reference contact information you’d like us to use  
• Any additional documents or notes you keep in Gmail or Notion that are relevant to the screening

If the files are already stored in your Gmail or Notion workspace, feel free to forward or share the links; just be sure the sharing permissions allow backgrounds@verifyright.com to access them. All information will be handled securely and in compliance with FCRA and applicable data-privacy regulations.

Please let me know if you have any questions or if there’s anything else we can do to help you through the process. Thank you for your prompt attention.

Best regards,

[Your Name]  
Client Success Team | VerifyRight  
backgrounds@verifyright.com | (555) 555-1234
